name: The Corona Connection
description:
Made during the 48 hours of klujam7 by Philipp and Patrizia (artwork).

The idea is that you stream the game via Twitch and your viewers can play the game. Here is a gameplay video to give you a better impression: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/603566101

Minor source hacking required to get 1.0 to work as you need to provide your credentials.
For now you have to manually restart rounds by pressing "R" and there are a couple  other rough edges.
